original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Ranil Wickremesinghe on Wednesday (17) appointed three new provincial governors, said the President's Media Division.
Lakshman Yapa Abeywardena – Governor of the North Western Province
DMC to become global responder, and Sri Lankan military will be gradually right-sized – State Minister
4 Children, Including Baby, Found Alive In Amazon 17 days after plane crash
Rupee strengthens further against USD; Buying rate drops to below Rs. 300/-
